title: Being late for Isha and the Imam already started Taraweeh, what to do?
transcript: if a person misses prayer in the Masjid and he comes and he finds that the IM has started what should he do and is he rewarded for that he should join the IM now the IM is praying two ra of you should join the IM with the intention of praying is behind him so when he finishes the two raas and offers Salam you stand up and finish your third and fourth raak and you will get the reward of congregation however you would have missed the reward of praying with the Imam until he's finished of Twi which gives you the reward of a full night
